sub_title: Strategy | New Business Development | Marketing | Operations Planning | Creative Thinking | New Routes to Market | Investor Relations | Start-up
summary:
Co-Founder, Head of Strategy and New Business Development at MadebyHumans.ai, is an integral member of the executive management team based in Amsterdam, responsible for the development, implementation and execution of strategies that contribute to the company´s business goals. Involved in strategic marketing and operations planning with top executives, setting objectives and identifying methods to reach business goals.
MadebyHumans.ai is dedicated to build smart AI solutions and focused on data-engineering, computer vision, machine learning and natural language processing with a special attention to the data and infrastructure. 

An experienced Credit Risk Manager with extensive knowledge in SOX, Anti Money Laundry, Customer Due Diligence, Know Your Customer, and implementing and maintaining effective and professional credit control systems for large complex deals from USD 1M up to USD 200M. Designing of Credit policies and SOX controls.
Trusted Business Partner working together with regional finance leaders to maintain and reduce daily sales outstanding (DSO), and with sales executives from business development on deal negotiation, including FP&A.
Highly focused on aligning the credit strategy with the accounts receivables/collections teams ( Shared Services Centers in India and Poland ) on issues such as payment performance, reviewing customer’s financial information, applying KYC (Knowing your Customer), CDD (Customer Due Diligence) and AML (Anti Money Laundry) procedures, as well as integrating customers coming from M&A.
Recognized as an excellent team player, coach, and business partner, a builder of trusting, win-win relationships, from individual contributors to executives. 
KEY SKILLS

 
	Financial Analysis
.     SOX Compliance
.     Internal Audit
	Risk Management
	Contract Negotiation
	Business Strategy
	Credit Risk
	Banking
	Treasury
	Finance
	Teamwork
	Management
	Corporate Finance
	Change Management
	Team Leadership
	Business Partnership
	Training

profile_positions.title: Derivatives Trader

profile_positions.description:
Cisco Capital, Credit Risk Manager, Internal Audit, SOX, AML Anti Money Laundry, CDD Customer Due Diligence, KYC Know Your Customer.                                                     
Responsible for 500 trade credit accounts in the Mediterranean, Eastern Europe and Sub-Saharan African regions. $2 Billion portfolio and $5M Credit authority, also in charge of major customers with credit lines of $200M±. Achieving reduction of portfolio’s DSO from 80 to 30 net, and recovering USD 50M bad debt.

	*Risk Management – Accounts in high political risk countries that needed special attention. 
	*Management - Knowledge of manage a Credit & Collections teams, and International Shared Service Center (Poland and India).
	*Contract Negotiation – For high risk accounts that would include risk mitigators, setting up payment schemes and securities.
	*Business Strategy – Design of the EMEA Credit Team, including the extended payment terms programs with international banks. Developed procedures and internal controls in compliance with Sarbanes-Oxley initiatives.
	*Training – Trainer of new members of the Credit and Collections teams in portfolio management, reduction of DSO and bad debt.
	*Business Partnership – Strategic partnership with Sales Executives to reach corporate targets.
	*Corporate Finance – Financial Micromanagement of Cisco’s partners under financial distress. 
	*Financial Analysis – e Views Modeling with Excel, Montecarlo Simulations, Coding with Matlab. Oracle and Bloomberg Station expert. 
	*Technical skills – Development of credit tools, formulation and implementation of credit policies to support financial and sales goals.
profile_positions.title: Credit Risk Manager for Europe and Emerging Markets

profile_positions.title: Collections Manager for Internet Service Providers in the Mediterranean Market.

profile_positions.description:
•.    Credit Manager, Internal Auditor, Anti Money Laundry, Customer Due Diligence, Know your Customer.
•.    Day to day operation of Discount of Bonds for credit lines in Mexican Pesos and US Dollars with Emerging Markets funds.
•.   Responsible for management of end-to-end credit process for fast-growing commercial bank. Banorte is the 4th largest bank in Mexico.

Responsibilities/Achievements:
•	Achieved 1000% increase in revenue from credit products
•	Analysed, evaluated and decided on validity of investment projects
•	Designed, developed and applied a new credit product that now is a leading product in the credit market.
•	Held responsibility for increasing the credit portfolio and customer service levels for the entire region.
•	Managed the assets & liabilities to increase profit margins for the area branches
•	Oversaw the promotion, operation and discount of Credits.
•	Designed and managed financial projects.
•	Import-Export Financing with EXIM banks of North America, Asia and Europe.
